questions.question: Which inference can be made about Katie Bouman based on "Doctoral Student Played a Big Part in First Black Hole Photo?"

choices.answer: She is modest and humble about her contributions to the project
She wants people to know how hard she worked on this project.
When asked to assist with this project, she doubted her abilities.
During the course of this project, she worked on little else.

questions.question: Which inference can be made about Daniel Williams based on "Healing a Wounded Heart: Daniel Hale Williams"?

choices.answer: Dr. Williams became wealthy and famous but never lost sight of his purpose.
Dr. Williams was not only a skilled doctor, he was kind and thoughtful.
Dr. Williams knew what to do when faced with the prospect of heart surgery.
Dr. Williams was thinking about people who could not afford to pay.

questions.question: Which inference can be made about Marie Curie based on "Marie Curie and the Discovery of Radioactivity"?

choices.answer: Marie Curie wanted to make money with her discovery of radium.
Marie Curie broke gender barriers in the field of science.
Marie Curie resented Pierre's work with radium.
Marie Curie was not a good businesswoman when it came to her discovery.

questions.question: Which source will provide the most accurate information about a person's motivations?

choices.answer: an essay analyzing the impact of the interview subject on history
an opinion article about the interview
a personal interview
a television show analyzing the interview

questions.question: Which domain extension provides the most accurate and reliable information when doing research?

choices.answer: .org
.net
.gov
.com

questions.question: Which sentence contains a word in bold that is used incorrectly?

choices.answer: This best-selling book series has won much acclaim.
I manipulated the pillows by washing them.
The Odyssey is a poem about a man who undertakes a 20-year ocean voyage.
The kindergartens tapped on wooden blocks along to create a simple rhythm.

questions.question: Which answer best corrects this phrase fragment? Unwinding the hose. The man watered the dry lawn.

choices.answer: Unwinding the hose, the man watered the dry lawn.
The man watered the dry lawn. The man unwinding the hose.
The man watered unwinding the hose the dry lawn.
The man watered the dry lawn. The man unwinding the hose.

imageMetadata.altText: Holding water rubber hose tube. Watering

questions.question: Which answer is a run-on sentence?

choices.answer: Which answer is a run-on sentence?
Bald eagles build nests of branches; the nests may weigh tons.
Humpback whales sing songs every year.
Some tortoises are huge, you can ride on them.

questions.question: Which sentence best corrects the clause fragment? Kayla closed the kitchen window. Because she was cold.

choices.answer: Which sentence best correctd the clause fragment? Kayla closed the kitchen
Which sentence best corrects the clause fragment? Kayla closed the kitchen
Because she was cold. Kayla closed the kitchen window.
She was cold Kayla closed the kitchen window.

questions.question: Which sentence is a run-on sentence?

choices.answer: Coyotes are coming into the neighborhood because their habitat is shrinking
Raccoons have sensitive paws, they can use to feel for food.
Lizards like to lie in the sun; it helps warm their bodies.
Skunks let out a horrible smell that is hard to get rid of.
